content: free crochet bunny pattern for a quick-to-make crochet easter bunny motif to decorate your table for easter or to use as tags to decorate your easter gifts for your friends and family these little easter bunny motif appliqués look really cute and are great for personalising your easter gift bags these fun and seasonal bunnies are made in one piece first the body is worked in the round then the head and ears are added and the tail is made they are very easy to do and work up in about 10 minutes they are perfect for little oddments of yarn and yarn scraps from your yarn stash i used **double knitting** or **light worsted weight** yarn with a 3 5mm hook us e/4 but you could also use thicker yarn with a larger hook or thinner yarn with a smaller hook
